main event: A civilian in Booneville, Missouri reported a UFO sighting on 8-6-56 lasting about 2-3 minutes, with the object appearing to travel westbound through the sky and disappearing in the west.
interesting points: The object had a white or greenish tail and was about 1/20 of the moon's diameter in size.
It was observed at an altitude of about 8 to 12 thousand feet and gradually decreased in size as it traveled 3/4 of the horizon westbound.
The sighting was ground-visual and observed both with the naked eye and binoculars.
The witness was a civilian and the sighting was confirmed to have occurred just south of Booneville, Missouri.
Weather conditions at the time of the sighting were clear with unlimited visibility.
sighted object: single UFO with a white or greenish tail
